title: Barao Natural - B3
typeOfFood: Vegan, International, Italian, Western, Buffet, Salad bar, Latin American
description: Its 3rd restaurant, offering an all-you-can-eat salad buffet and main meal (two options per day). On Wednesday and Saturday nights it offers a different menu with burgers, appetizers, and sandwiches. Next to Fradique Coutinho subway station. Per Cow Ambassador food is all vegan.
